0.title: Lost at Sea
0.description: An unruly gust of wind and a few too many days of torrential downpour have left you without direction.
choices: Purchase a map from a nearby trader
choice_descriptions: Purchase a map from a nearby trader

1.title: Ambush!
1.description: The ship has been following you for some time suddenly raises their skull-and-crossbone flag!

2.title: Navigated Safely
2.description: You were able to navigate safely, at the cost of additional rations.

3.title: Money Well Spent
3.description: The map costs you some gold, but you navigate with no difficulty.
choice_descriptions: All that ends well is well.

4.title: Clueless Sailing
4.description: Choosing to sail forward without a clue where to might have been a bad idea. You figure out the way, but not before wasting some supplies at sea.

5.title: Clash of the Dreadnoughts
5.description: After the smoke clears, you see you took a few hits...which doesn't hurt that much, when you look at the treasure chest the pirates left.

6.title: Thieves' Honor
6.description: You pay gold for your safety, which they guarantee, but you feel a cost greater than gold has been paid from your heart.
choice_descriptions: Hopefully we do not encounter them again.

7.title: Racer of the High Seas
7.description: A sudden wind rises, and rowing at full strength, you zoom away. Exhausted, you'll need extra rations, but the pirates won't get you this time.

8.title: Someone in Need
8.description: Off in the distance, you see a shape that looks like a stranded ship.

9.title: They Needed Your Help
9.description: It is a stranded sailor. They look to be about your age, ragged and hungry.

10.title: Row Away
10.description: You row away, but you have a feeling that your mom would have been disappointed in you.

11.title: Share Food
11.description: You give them some food. They seem to gain back some energy.

12.title: Share the Wealth
12.description: You offer them some money for food and supples. They are grateful for your help.

13.title: Game Over...?
13.description: You feel your health failing...Is this the end?

14.title: Am I Starving?
14.description: You open the pantry to find...no food. Your stomach growls, and you feel your health wane.

15.title: Respawn
15.description: You wake up...where? You feel betterâ€”someone must have helped you while you were out.

16.title: Bubbling Water
16.description: You see some bubbles coming up from the ocean.

17.title: Fishing Spot
17.description: You throw out your line, just the way mom taught you. You pull up a large, wriggling fish.

18.title: Sailing the High Seas
18.description: You continue to sail the ocean. It looks beautiful today.
